hero.title: Your AI Co-founder.
hero.subtitle: The ultimate AI toolkit to build and grow your startup.

features.title: How does Be Startup work?
features.subtitle: Transform your startup journey with AI-powered tools that handle the complexity, so you can focus on what matters most.

step1.title: Share Your Vision
step1.description: Tell our AI about your startup idea, goals, and market focus in simple conversation.

step2.title: AI Creates Your Foundation
step2.description: Get comprehensive business plans, market analysis, and technical architecture instantly.

step3.title: Launch & Scale
step3.description: Deploy your startup with AI-generated content, code, and ongoing mentorship support.

bento.title: Only platform that you will ever need
bento.more_title: Everything you need to get ahead.

business.title: AI Business planner
business.description: Generate a complete, investor-ready business plan in minutes.

mentor.title: AI Mentor & Guides
mentor.description: Step-by-step guidance and mentorship through AI-driven tutorials and personalized support for projects or learning paths.

vision.title: AI vision planner
vision.description: Helps you define and structure your long-term goals or business vision using AI-assisted frameworks and strategy suggestions.

gpt.title: Bestartup GPT
gpt.description: A startup-focused AI tool that assists with ideation, planning, and execution of business models and entrepreneurial strategies.

code.title: AI Code Generator
code.description: Develops application infrastructure and backend for startups

image_generator.title: AI Image Generator
image_generator.description: Creates high-quality, customized images or visuals from text prompts using generative AI.

voice_over.title: AI Voice Over
voice_over.description: Converts text to realistic voice narrations using AI, suitable for videos, tutorials, and presentations.

article_wizard.title: AI Article Wizard
article_wizard.description: Generates well-structured articles or blog posts from brief input, optimized for readability and SEO.

website_analyzer.title: AI Website Analyzer
website_analyzer.description: Evaluates website performance, usability, and SEO factors, giving actionable improvement suggestions.

image_analyzer.title: AI Image Analyzer
image_analyzer.description: Analyzes images to detect objects, extract features, or provide insights for content or product analysis.

speech_to_text.title: AI Speech-To-Text
speech_to_text.description: Transcribes spoken audio into accurate written text for documentation, subtitles, or note-taking.

content_editor.title: AI Content Editor
content_editor.description: Enhances written content for clarity, grammar, tone, and structure using AI-powered suggestions.

doc_analyzer.title: AI Doc. Analyzer
doc_analyzer.description: Reviews documents and extracts key insights, summarizes content, or checks for consistency and accuracy.

presentation.title: AI Presentation
presentation.description: Creates visually stunning templates for pitch decks, sales presentations, portfolios, and product showcases

landing_page.title: AI Landing Page maker
landing_page.description: Designs sleek, captivating landing pages for websites with built-in content generation.

templates.title: AI Customized Templates
templates.description: Offers ready-made templates tailored to your needs (business, design, or content), auto-filled using AI.
